title: Seawater electrolysis for fuels and chemicals production: fundamentals, achievements, and perspectives
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00822C, Review Article
Lin Chen, Chang Yu, Junting Dong, Yingnan Han, Hongling Huang, Wenbin Li, Yafang Zhang, Xinyi Tan, Jieshan Qiu
The production of value-added fuels and chemicals via seawater electrolysis is a promising step or support towards sustainable energy development and carbon neutrality.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
